ORDER BY isdefault desc
SELECT count(1) as value FROM SPS_ACCOUNT_RATIO

select t.ratio_id, t.insurance_id , i.`name` as insurance_name, t.`name`, a.living_type, r.corp_ratio*100 as corp_ratio,r.psn_ratio*100 as psn_ratio,r.corp_addition,r.psn_addition from ( select * from sps_account_ratio where acc_id = #{account_id} and isdefault = 'Y' ) a left join bs_arearatio t on a.ratio_id = t.ratio_id left join bs_arearatiover r on t.ratio_id = r.ratio_id left join bd_insurance i on t.insurance_id=i.insurance_id where ((replace(r.begin_period,"-","") <= #{begin_date} and replace(r.end_period,"-","") >= #{begin_date}) or (replace(r.begin_period,"-","") <= #{begin_date} and r.end_period is null)) and i.insurance_fund_type= #{ins_fund_type} and t.dr=0 order by t.insurance_id

SELECT aaa.* from SPS_ACCOUNT_RATIO aaa LEFT JOIN bs_arearatio bbb ON aaa.ratio_id = bbb.ratio_id WHERE aaa.acc_id=#{accId} and aaa.living_type=#{livingType} GROUP BY aaa.ratio_id ORDER BY bbb.insurance_id

select t.ratio_id as ratioId,t.insurance_id as insuranceId,i.`name` as insuranceName , TRUNCATE(TRUNCATE(r.`corp_ratio`,4)*100,2) as corpRatio,TRUNCATE(TRUNCATE(r.`psn_ratio`,4)*100,2) as psnRatio ,IFNULL(r.corp_addition,0) as corpAddition,IFNULL(r.psn_addition,0) as psnAddition, (select group_concat(DISTINCT s.living_type) from bs_arearatioscope s where s.ratio_id=t.ratio_id) as liveTypes
,scope.isDefault
,t.billing_cycle as billingCycle ,r.corp_base_lower as lowerNum, r.corp_base_upper as upperNum from ( select * from bs_arearatio where area_id = #{area_id} ) t inner join bs_arearatiover r on t.ratio_id = r.ratio_id inner join bd_insurance i on t.insurance_id=i.insurance_id
inner join bs_arearatioscope scope on scope.ratio_id = t.ratio_id and scope.living_type = #{livingType}
where ((r.begin_period <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') and r.end_period >=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m')) or (r.begin_period <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') and r.end_period is null)) and i.insurance_fund_type= #{insFundType} and t.dr=0 order by
ifnull(scope.isdefault, 'N') desc, t.insurance_id,r.corp_ratio,r.psn_ratio
ifnull(r.corp_ratio,0)+ifnull(r.psn_ratio,0) desc,t.ratio_id,r.`corp_ratio`,r.`psn_ratio`
